channel.title: MenaceScape - 24/7
channel.description:
[CENTER][COLOR="Red"]WE GOT A VPS XD XD its 24/7
Information
- you MUST use the client or else it will say error of logging in.
client downloads
[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/147136953/Menacescape_Client.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/147136953/Menacescape_Client.rar.html[/url]
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XAGBCH5D]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XAGBCH5D[/url]
The ip is : 75.127.119.105
The forums : i can't post, when you run the client it links you to the forums, please register there to.
Join today!
The project thread
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?p=809338]http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?p=809338[/url][/COLOR]
MenaceScape is ready to be released. The VPS is bought but i have to wait 48 hours, bought : september 20, 2008 around 10:30PM eastern.
As i had to take my forums link out the thread, i have put it in the client, read the "read-me.txt" file.
[B]Client Download
[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/147136953/Menacescape_Client.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/147136953/Menacescape_Client.rar.html[/url]
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XAGBCH5D]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XAGBCH5D[/url]
[/b]
You need the client to connect.
The forums is still not finished. The server is not finished yet.
I have no staffs beside me and ziya. I really need more staffs, if you want to be one, please register at site and post and help others. I will pick about 3 in the first week when the server gets released.
When the server gets released, i will post this thread in the "advertise" section.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Mini-games[/b]
Assault [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2ius5ye&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2ius5ye&s=4[/url] ---------------------------- Kalphite Queen [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=do0u8m&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=do0u8m&s=4[/url] ----------------------------- Barrows [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2w58vac&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2w58vac&s=4[/url] ----------------------------- KBD [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2n65kdi&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2n65kdi&s=4[/url] -----------------------------
[COLOR="Red"]The Skills - I will improve and add more skills later on.[/COLOR]
-----------------------------
Range [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2moyq2q&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2moyq2q&s=4[/url] ----------------------------- Magic [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2i7p3&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2i7p3&s=4[/url] ----------------------------- Prayer [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=jpknb6&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=jpknb6&s=4[/url] ----------------------------- Fletching [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=25svp6d&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=25svp6d&s=4[/url] ----------------------------- Slayer [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2lwukqv&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2lwukqv&s=4[/url] -----------------------------
Firemaking [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=vcw01s&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=vcw01s&s=4[/url] -----------------------------
Woodcutting [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=vcw01s&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=vcw01s&s=4[/url] -----------------------------
[b]Other Features[/b]
Pking skulls not added yet, i have them but im not releasing until i get the prayer working with them.
Difference levels - They work, you can't others that not your level.
Wild levels - added, good and good.
The jad mi****me is under developement. I am trying to make it hard to get, so please wait XD
In other news : The server is running on a vps, it could hold 150 players and a little more. It will be on 24/7.
If it crashes or something, then the auto restarter will do it by it self. The auto restarter is put as every 30 minutes it restarts.
Earn money by killing npcs
Golbin drops about 500coins The man drops about 300 coins
I hope you like the server, MenaceScape Revolved Released[/CENTER]

item.title: MenaceScape - 24/7

item.description:
@wtf_is_life wrote:

[CENTER][COLOR=“Red”]WE GOT A VPS XD XD its 24/7

Information

  • you MUST use the client or else it will say error of logging in.

client downloads

http://rapidshare.com/files/147136953/Menacescape_Client.rar.html

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XAGBCH5D

The ip is : 75.127.119.105

The forums : i can’t post, when you run the client it links you to the forums, please register there to.

Join today!

The project thread

http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?p=809338[/COLOR]

MenaceScape is ready to be released. The VPS is bought but i have to wait 48 hours, bought : september 20, 2008 around 10:30PM eastern.

As i had to take my forums link out the thread, i have put it in the client, read the “read-me.txt” file.

[B]Client Download

http://rapidshare.com/files/147136953/Menacescape_Client.rar.html

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XAGBCH5D

[/b]

You need the client to connect.

The forums is still not finished.
The server is not finished yet.

I have no staffs beside me and ziya. I really need more staffs, if you want to be one, please register at site and post and help others. I will pick about 3 in the first week when the server gets released.

When the server gets released, i will post this thread in the “advertise” section.

Mini-games

Other Features

Pking skulls not added yet, i have them but im not releasing until i get the prayer working with them.

Difference levels - They work, you can’t others that not your level.

Wild levels - added, good and good.

The jad mi****me is under developement. I am trying to make it hard to get, so please wait XD

In other news : The server is running on a vps, it could hold 150 players and a little more. It will be on 24/7.

If it crashes or something, then the auto restarter will do it by it self. The auto restarter is put as every 30 minutes it restarts.

Earn money by killing npcs

Golbin drops about 500coins
The man drops about 300 coins

I hope you like the server,
MenaceScape Revolved Released[/CENTER]
